General.Name: Cita Mineral Investindo Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Cita Mineral Investindo Tbk engages in bauxite mining activities in Indonesia. The company was formerly known as PT Cipta Panel Utama Tbk and changed its name to PT Cita Mineral Investindo Tbk in May 2007. PT Cita Mineral Investindo Tbk was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT Cita Mineral Investindo Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Harita Jayaraya Inc.
General.Address: Panin Bank Building, Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia, 10270
